ud4.2:4.2: The variant _micchādiṭṭhigatena_ is the more obvious reading. However, _micchādiṭṭhihatā_ appears at [an4.49]() without variants. Commentary accepts _hata_ in both places. Here it glosses _sassatādimicchābhinivesadūsitena_.
ud4.2:5.1: Commentary: _rakkhitacitto assa_, literally “be one of guarded mind”.
